name: Zoio The Eye of Chaos
description:
In the city of São Marcos-RS, Brazil, there is a punk called Zoio Ramone, and he was our inspiration for the game, all the others events are pure fiction. As a classic stereotype of punk, taking anarchy and turning the city into chaos is your goal. As the main character, you must prevent the destruction of public assets within a certain time, reconstructing what Zoio destroyed and moving on to other phases.

Credists:

Bruno Dal'Lago - Programming
Évelyn Rech - Graphics
Guilherme Bolzan Veronese - Concept

Music by https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH76SI-jB__ESlYKtHdNjVg
